√lamb 'hang down'

present: [1.] lambate etc. B.+  lambati etc. E.+  

perfect: lalambe etc. E.+  

[aorist: alalambat  alambiṣṭa  ]

future: [1.] lambiṣyati  alambiṣyata   -- [2.] lambitā  

verbal: lambita E.+  lambitum E.+  -lambya E.+  

secondary: passive: lambyate etc. E.+   -- causative: lambayati etc. E.+  lambayate  lambyate etc. E.+  

derivatives: lamba B.+  lambaka C.  lambin B.+  -lambya C.  lambana E.+  -lambuka B.  -lambitavya C.  

Compare the other-form, ramb.
